name: Mother Simulator 3D
description:
Best simulator of complicated parent weekdays on mobile platforms. Whoever you are in real life – student, blogger, fitness trainer or a brutal biker with awesome beard, here you can try yourself in the role of young and inexperienced mother.

Be patient, get ready for sparkling chaos that will occur in the game, come to terms with the fact that it is impossible to control situation and simply enjoy small victories. After all, victory demonstrates how sharp your parental instincts are!

ATTENTION! For the manifestation of maternal love and care (that’s why you came here, right?) we launched a virtual conveyor for production of robotic babies. Don’t think that we don’t trust you or don’t believe in your powers – safe practice will save us from unnecessary legal proceedings.

Not scared yet? Then we are waiting for you in the game to share all the joys of motherhood together!
